'''Dendro Sigils''' can be found in [[Sumeru]]. It can be offered to the [[Vanarana's Favor|Tree of Dreams]] to obtain valuable rewards.

They can be obtained in Sumeru by opening [[chests]], completing one-time [[Domains]], and from rewards from the [[Statue of The Seven]].
